HEADER.TITLE: MedTagger
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Open Source platform for aggregation and annotation of medical images powered by crowdsourcing.

DESCRIPTION.SIGN_IN: Good to see you back! Log in and continue your work.
DESCRIPTION.SIGN_UP: Start labeling with MedTagger today. It is easy! Just take your time and fill this registration form and you are ready to go.

MARKER.SCREEN_INFO: Please use bigger screen to start labeling.

ZOOM.TITLE: Image Window
ZOOM.SUBTITLE: Correct image brightness and contrast by tuning parameters below

USERS.TITLE: Users
USERS.SUBTITLE: Browse users and change their's privilages

TUTORIAL.DONT_SHOW_AGAIN: Do not show this tutorial again

SINGLE.TITLE: Single 3D Scan
SINGLE.DESCRIPTION: Select this option if you want to upload a single 3D Scan.

MULTIPLE.TITLE: Multiple 3D Scans
MULTIPLE.DESCRIPTION: Select this option if you want to upload multiple 3D Scans.

BEFORE_SELECTION.TITLE: Single 3D Scan
BEFORE_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION: Go to the directory containing CT Scan and select all DICOM files (*.dcm).
BEFORE_SELECTION.WARNING:
Not all of your files will be uploaded!
Some of them may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.

AFTER_SELECTION.TITLE: Selected Scans
AFTER_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION:
You can also specify Predefined Label which will be shown initially
on the Labeling Page. To do so, send "TASK_KEY.json" file together with your DICOM files.

BEFORE_SELECTION.TITLE: Multiple 3D Scans
BEFORE_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION: Select parent directory that contains subdirectories with CT Scans.
BEFORE_SELECTION.WARNING:
Not all of your files will be uploaded!
Some of them may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.

AFTER_SELECTION.TITLE: Selected Scans
AFTER_SELECTION.DESCRIPTION:
You can also specify Predefined Label which will be shown initially
on the Labeling Page. To do so, send "TASK_KEY.json" file together with your DICOM files.

SUMMARY.LABEL: Summary
SUMMARY.TITLE: Upload Summary
SUMMARY.DESCRITPION:
Upload completed sucessfully!
All of your scans are now available for labeling.
SUMMARY.WARNING:
There were some issues with uploading your scans!
Your files may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.
SUMMARY.ERROR:
None of your scans were uploaded properly!
Your files may be corrupted or incompatible with MedTagger.

LABEL_EXPLORER.NO_LABELS_FOR_TAG: There are no labels for this tag.
LABEL_EXPLORER.NO_LABELS_ADDED: No labels have been added so far.
LABEL_EXPLORER.ADD_LABELS: Add new labels using available tools.

MESSAGE.SELECT_TAG: Please select Tag and Tool to start labeling.
MESSAGE.SELECT_TOOL: Please select Tool to start labeling.

TASK_EXPLORER.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error while downloading tasks

OPERATION.DRAG_TO_SELECT: Use mouse drag to create labels
OPERATION.CLICK_TO_SELECT: Use left mouse click to create labels
